info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 4:17PM MDT until July 30 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DANIELS AND EAST CENTRAL VALLEY COUNTIES... At 415 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Lustre, or 27 miles northeast of Glasgow, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 410 PM, a 70 mph wind gust was reported at Saint Marie. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... St. Marie and Larslan. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
